DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess whether added food ingredient(s) affect glycemic responses to a liquid meal tolerance test (LMTT).
DOC.criteria: Male or female (not less than 40% males or females Nonsmoker Aged 18 to 55 years Have a body mass index between 18.5 to 29.99 kg/m2 Healthy, nondiabetic, no gastric bypass surgery Having a fasting plasma glucose (finger stick) <100 mg/dl (<5.5 mmol/L) Willing and able to provide written informed consent
